snippet.title: The Lonely Hacker
snippet.description:
The most fun and realistic hacking simulation game ever made!
Learn everything there is to know about hacking with this mobile game, made by real security experts.

Get the game NOW here : 
Android : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TheLonelyDeveloper.TheLonelyHacker
iPhone : https://apps.apple.com/us/app/the-lonely-hacker/id1633242696
